Desc.eng: Good to see you, stranger! You must be a hunter, I presume.
That's pure gibberish. What was that supposed to mean?
Honestly? I have no idea, but it always worked for me.
I don't see how this concerns us.
Well, I hired a hunter recently who looked like you a bit.
And how can you possibly know that? Is it the weapons? The air of mystery? The ghost?

That hunter was supposed to destroy a black idol in the Ink, but he hasn't returned yet. The idol ties this spot to the Ink and allows monsters to pass through freely. I can keep them back, but not for long.
If this hunter is truly anything like me, he has already destroyed the idol and he's killing monsters on the other side.
I doubt that. The bridge would be closed in that case, but it's still here. The question is: are you willing to help me?
Yes. I'd like to meet this hunter anyway.
Give the man some more time. We have other things to do. Goodbye.
Wait! If the gate bridge disappears after the idol is shattered, how will we return?
The following incantation will open a temporary gate at the idol: "FlooMe!"
